short_summary: Solicitation of Services for: Single Level Development of Documentation for Canadian National Master Construction Specifications (NMS)
description: The Construction Research Centre (CRC) of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is responsible for managing the Canadian National Master Construction Specification (NMS), which is an essential tool for design and construction documentation in Canada.
full_summary:
**Note:**
* This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) is now CLOSED.
* The solicitation number is 22-58036. For Reference.
**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO):**
* **Title:** Development of Technical Content for the Canadian National Master Construction Specification (NMS)
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01004926
* **Date:** Publication Date: September 2, 2022; Tender Closing Date: October 25, 2022 14:00:00 EST
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSA)
* **Description:**
The National Research Council of Canada’s (NRC) Construction Research Centre (CRC) is responsible for managing the Canadian National Master Construction Specification (NMS). The NMS is a crucial tool in design and construction documentation for Canada. To maintain relevance, the NMS must be continuously revised and updated with new content that aligns with current National Model Codes, reference standards, construction technology, and industry practices.
Our Centre requires technical writing services for the development of new and updating existing content within the Canadian National Master Construction Specification (NMS).
The scope of work may include any of the topics identified in the Appendix A Chart, as per MasterFormat 2020. 

* **Gationale:**
This standing offer is required to support the creation of new and updated content for the CNMS.
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Services and Capabilities:**
*   The successful contractor must provide training and documentation for updating CNMS content.
*   Services may include development, validation, and quality assurance for updated CNMS content.
*   Other services may include image development, research, subject matter expertise, and project management services.
*   Contractors must be prepared to meet the assigned deadlines in accordance with the specified timelines for delivery.
*   Services delivered will be esteemed a Work-for-Hire.
*   Contractors will be required obtain the relevant designations requiring completion of Manufacturing Technician Level 1, 2, 3 as well as Plan Authorization Level 1 and 2 credential based on date of contract award.

* **Account Responsibilities:**
   *   The successful contractor must provide an integrity declaration before the relationship.
*   The successful contractor must designate a Chief Information Booking Officer, who is responsible for managing data centers and cybersecurity. 
*   The Contractor is independently responsible to ensuring all information provided, posted, contained or expressed is [True and existed]
